title: North Austin Soccer
description: ABOUT USWelcome to North Austin Soccer (NAS). We are the largest and most active organized co-ed soccer pick-up group in Austin with at least 4-5 games per week in North Central Austin and NW Austin/Cedar Park area. We welcome players of all ages above 18 yo and skill levels. If you're looking for fun, active people to play soccer with than you've come to the right place!Right now, NAS plays on a Summer and Winter schedule due to daylight hours and at several locations.SUMMER SCHEDULE (5-6x weekly), Mar - OctWINTER SCHEDULE (3-5x weekly), Nov -MarYEAR ROUND: We play year round as league teams (NAAFC - see Pages tab above) through Austin Mens Soccer Association (AMSA), Round Rock Soccer Assocation, Austin Coed Soccer Association (ACSA) and at Lakeline SoccerZone (Cedar Park).Any other suggestions for fields are welcomed - just PM me.The club is FREE to join.We use nice sized goals for...

title: South Austin Soccer
description: This group is for all skill levels, whether you are in a league, haven't played in 10+ years, want to stay active and involved with the game, etc. We have a weekly scheduled pickup game at Zilker on Sunday mornings. On average, we have about 20 players come out per meetup even if there are less RSVPs. Members are also encouraged to network with each other to share other soccer events/ideas.

title: Varsity Gay League: Austin Recreational Queer+ Sports League
description: Varsity Gay League (VGL) is the nationâ€™s original Queer+ recreational sports league, founded in 2007 and proudly representing over 20,000 LGBTQ+ & allied athletes across the US. Everyone is welcome, regardless of experience or identity. Our inclusive league offers a comprehensive list of social sports including Dodgeball, Kickball, Tennis, Soccer, Beach Volleyball, Bowling, Darts, and more to the Queer+ community, an umbrella term uniting the queer and allied communities for the love of sports. http://www.varsitygayleague.com/

title: Cricket and Soccer
description: The purpose of this group is to meet like-minded people who are interested in Cricket and/or Soccer. All skill levels and age groups are welcome.
